title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not work consistently. Specifically, when I followed the steps below, nothing happened:
1. Close all editors
2. Create a new file named f1.txt
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code
2. Close all open editors
3. Create a new file named f1.txt
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu
